faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subheading: Everything you need to know about our pricing

0.question: How do monthly plans and one-time services work together?
0.answer: Monthly plans cover hosting, maintenance, and support. One-time services are for initial design and build. For example: Pay €5,000 once for design + build, then €499/month for hosting and maintenance.

1.question: Can I just get design or build without a monthly plan?
1.answer: Yes! With the Developer plan (€199/month), you get API access to build your own frontend. Or purchase Design Only and build it yourself. The Professional plan (€499/month) is only needed if you want us to host and maintain your website.

2.question: What's included in the €5,000 Design + Build package?
2.answer: Complete UI/UX design for up to 5 pages, full React frontend development, CMS integration, testing, and deployment. Additional pages are €400 each. Add-ons like logo design (€800) and blog setup (€500) available.

3.question: How long does design and build take?
3.answer: Typically 2-3 weeks for the complete Design + Build package. Design Only takes 1-2 weeks, Build Only takes 2 weeks.

4.question: Can I switch plans later?
4.answer: Yes! You can upgrade from Developer to Professional at any time, or move between tiers as your needs change.

5.question: What payment methods do you accept?
5.answer: We accept bank transfers and all major credit cards. One-time services require 50% upfront, 50% on completion. Monthly plans are billed monthly.

6.question: What happens if I cancel my monthly plan?
6.answer: You can cancel anytime with 30 days notice. Your service continues until the end of your billing period. If you paid for design/build, that work is yours to keep.

cta.heading: Ready to get started?

hero.title: Built for agents,
hero.description: We believe every ambitious real estate agent deserves a professional online presence without the complexity and cost of custom development.

mission.heading: Empowering agents to succeed online
mission.paragraph1: We created MyAgentWebsite after seeing too many talented real estate agents struggle with expensive, complicated website solutions or settle for generic marketplace profiles that don't build their personal brand.
mission.paragraph2: Our platform gives you the professional tools you need to establish credibility, showcase your expertise, and grow your business—all without needing technical knowledge or breaking the bank.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the #1 website platform for independent real estate agents who want to build their own brand and succeed on their own terms.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: Simplicity, transparency, and customer success. We're here to help you win, not to complicate your life with complex tools.

different.heading: Why we're different
different.subheading: We're not just another website builder

realEstate.title: Built for Real Estate
realEstate.description: Unlike generic website builders, every feature is designed specifically for real estate agents. Property listings, testimonials, market insights—it's all built in.

modern.title: Modern Technology
modern.description: Built with React and Rails, not outdated WordPress. Your website is fast, secure, and uses the same technology that powers modern web applications.

customerFirst.title: Customer-First
customerFirst.description: We win when you win. Our pricing is transparent, our support is responsive, and we're constantly improving based on agent feedback.

story.heading: How MyAgentWebsite came to be
story.paragraph1: MyAgentWebsite was born from a simple observation: talented real estate agents were being held back by technology.
story.paragraph2: Some agents spent €5,000+ on custom websites that took months to build and were impossible to update without a developer. Others settled for generic templates or marketplace profiles that didn't reflect their unique brand.
story.paragraph3: We knew there had to be a better way. A way that was:
story.paragraph4: Today, MyAgentWebsite helps ambitious agents establish their online presence, showcase their expertise, and grow their business—all without the complexity and cost of traditional solutions.
story.paragraph5: We're just getting started, and we'd love for you to join us.

faq.heading: Common Questions
faq.subheading: Quick answers to questions you may have

0.question: How quickly can I launch?
0.answer: Professional custom websites typically launch in 2-3 weeks. Developer plan with API access can be activated within 48 hours.

1.question: Do I need technical skills?
1.answer: Not at all! Our platform is designed for non-technical users. If you can use email, you can manage your website.

2.question: Can I use my own domain?
2.answer: Yes! Professional plan includes custom domain support. We'll help you connect your existing domain or register a new one.

3.question: What if I need help?
3.answer: All plans include email support. Professional and Enterprise plans get priority support with faster response times.
